titles.title: A resolution to express the deep regret of the Senate regarding the deaths of Ambassador Arnold Lewis Raphel and General Herbert Marion Wassom.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/8/1988--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the Senate on the deaths of Ambassador Arnold Lewis Raphel and Brigadier General Herbert Marion Wassom.
